title: Snorkeling at Hanauma Bay
seo_description: This protected marine life conservation area boasts some of the best snorkeling in the world.
contents_1: This protected marine life conservation area boasts some of the best snorkeling in the world.
description: Hanauma Bay Nature Preserve boasts some of the best snorkeling in the world. A protected marine life conservation area, this is the most popular destination for snorkelers to see colorful fish and vibrant coral reefs. Donâ€™t forget to bring your underwater camera!
